001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.interceptor;
002
003import lombok.Getter;
004import lombok.Setter;
005
006/**
007 * Represents an API response intercepted during UI tests.
008 *
009 * <p>This class stores the URL, HTTP status code, and response body of an intercepted
010 * network request. It is primarily used for validating API responses during UI tests.
011 *
012 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
013 */
014@Getter
015public class ApiResponse {
016
017   private final String url;
018   private final String method;
019   private final int status;
020
021   @Setter
022   private String body;
023
024   /**
025    * Constructs an {@code ApiResponse} with the specified URL and HTTP status.
026    *
027    * @param url    the URL of the intercepted request.
028    * @param method the HTTP method of the intercepted request.
029    * @param status the HTTP status code of the response.
030    */
031   public ApiResponse(final String url, final String method, final int status) {
032      this.url = url;
033      this.method = method;
034      this.status = status;
035   }
036}
